comments.text:
I now see that time is like a river that carries us forward into encounters with reality that requires us to make decisions. We can't stop our movement down this river ,and we can't avoid the encounters. We can only approach them in the best possible way.
英语渣。就是没用三单还有啥语法错误
Re Bob: 感觉不应该I now,应该now I？然后stop也不应该和down搭配

data.text: I now see that time is like a river that carry us forward into encounters with reality that require us to make decisions. We can't stop our movement down this river and we can't avoid the encounters. We can only approach them in the best possible way.
